levels.description: Instantly gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP and causes Cherry-3 to self-destruct, dealing <@ba.vup>{aoe_damage_scale:0%}</> of Mitm's ATK as Physical damage to enemies in the four adjacent tiles
